ingredients: Kosher or coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
Kosher or coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
1 zucchini, sliced in half lengthwise and thinly sliced into half-moons
1 package (8 or 9 ounces) no-boil lasagna noodles
3 cups (about 1 pound) shredded mozzarella, preferably fresh
